title: CUDNN_STATUS_EXECUTION_FAILED in RNN forward function
body_html:
I installed pytorch with python setup.py install. I use ubuntu 16.04 and python 2.7.12. Pytorch is built with cuda 9.1.85, libcudnn7 7.1.2.21, gcc 5.4.0 and cmake 3.10.0.
But the following error will occur while I want to run a model with RNN on my GTX 1080:

  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 371, in __call__
    result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/rnn.py", line 193, in forward
    output, hidden = func(input, self.all_weights, hx, batch_sizes)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/_functions/rnn.py", line 316, in forward
    return func(input, *fargs, **fkwargs)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/_functions/rnn.py", line 285, in forward
    dropout_ts)
RuntimeError: CUDNN_STATUS_EXECUTION_FAILED

Hope there are some advices to help me fix this.
body_text:
I installed pytorch with python setup.py install. I use ubuntu 16.04 and python 2.7.12. Pytorch is built with cuda 9.1.85, libcudnn7 7.1.2.21, gcc 5.4.0 and cmake 3.10.0.
But the following error will occur while I want to run a model with RNN on my GTX 1080:
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 371, in __call__
    result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/rnn.py", line 193, in forward
    output, hidden = func(input, self.all_weights, hx, batch_sizes)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/_functions/rnn.py", line 316, in forward
    return func(input, *fargs, **fkwargs)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/_functions/rnn.py", line 285, in forward

RuntimeError: CUDNN_STATUS_EXECUTION_FAILED

Hope there are some advices to help me fix this.
body:
I installed pytorch with `python setup.py install`. I use ubuntu 16.04 and python 2.7.12. Pytorch is built with cuda 9.1.85, libcudnn7 7.1.2.21, gcc 5.4.0 and cmake 3.10.0.
But the following error will occur while I want to run a model with RNN on my GTX 1080:
```
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 371, in __call__
    result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/rnn.py", line 193, in forward
    output, hidden = func(input, self.all_weights, hx, batch_sizes)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/_functions/rnn.py", line 316, in forward
    return func(input, *fargs, **fkwargs)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/_functions/rnn.py", line 285, in forward
    dropout_ts)
RuntimeError: CUDNN_STATUS_EXECUTION_FAILED
```
Hope there are some advices to help me fix this.
